thread.section_title: Cruisesalefinder Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cruisesalefinder | cruisesalefinder.com.au
thread.title: First time cruiser
thread.title_full: Cruisesalefinder reviewed by First time cruiser

author: First time cruiser
title: First time cruiser
text:
Would definitely recommend this site to first time cruisers like me. The site is easy to navigate and has all the required information. The customer service provided by support staff is excellent with no question to simple or hard.
A big call out to Cam - well done and thank you for making this process easy and enjoyable!!
